tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
    initiative_description TEXT,
    initiative_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE diversity_initiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE employee_participation (
    participation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    initiative_id INT,
    participation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employees(employee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES diversity_initiatives(initiative_id)
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_and_inclusion_initiatives (
    initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    lead_contact VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_participation (
    participation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    initiative_id INT NOT NULL,
    participation_date DATE,
    participation_status VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE initiative_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_id INT NOT NULL,
    employee_id INT NOT NULL,
    feedback TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE initiatives (
    initiative_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    initiative_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    initiative_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE event_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    event_description TEXT,
    user_id INTEGER,
    table_name VARCHAR(50),
    action VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE diversity_initiatives (
  initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(100),
  description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE employee_diversity (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(100),
  department VARCHAR(100),
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
  initiative_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES diversity_initiatives (initiative_id)
)

CREATE TABLE resource_allocation (
  allocation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_id INT,
  employee_id INT,
  allocation_date DATE,
  hours_allocated INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES diversity_initiatives (initiative_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee_diversity (employee_id)
)

CREATE TABLE event_tracking (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_name VARCHAR(100),
  event_date DATE,
  attendees_count INT,
  initiative_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES diversity_initiatives (initiative_id)
)

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
  response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  initiative_id INT,
  response_date DATE,
  question_1_rating INT,
  question_2_rating INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee_diversity (employee_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES diversity_initiatives (initiative_id)
)
